dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links between them. Each document is associated with a normalized bag-of-words feature vector and a class label.
dcterms:title: Citeseer

dcterms:creator: P. Sen
G. Namata
M. Bilgic
L. Getoor
B. Galligher
T. Eliassi-Rad
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to Citeseer, where nodes represent documents and edges represent citation links. Each document is associated with a normalized bag-of-words feature vector and a class label.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: Z. Yang
W. Cohen
R. Salakhudinov
dcterms:description: A bipartite graph dataset extracted from a knowledge graph, consisting of relation nodes and entity nodes. Each relation is represented as a triplet in the format (e1, r, e2).
dcterms:title: NELL
